{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3006697,"name":"","username":"NP102","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/np102/{size}/220441_2.png","created_at":"2022-02-12T18:03:06.630Z","cooked":"

We purchased these regulators from Andymark as a weight saving matter, but as you see the regulator gauges are quite small and are difficult to look at. Are these regulators FRC Legal since they’re difficult to look out.

Links to Regulators

andymark.com

Inline Pressure Gauge with 1/4 in. Press-in Tube Fittings

This is a miniature pressure gauge with two 1/4 in. push to connect fittings for in line installations. It is perfect for lightweight pneumatic systems where you need to mount a pressure gauge in line with a tubing run. This pressure gauge is...

andymark.com

Inline Pressure Regulator & Gauge with 1/8 in. NPT & 1/4 in. Press-in...

This is an all in one pressure regulator and low pressure side gauge perfect for lightweight pneumatic systems where you need to mount a regulator off a hard fitting for example a female threaded fitting, or a manifold. It features 1/8 in. NPT input...

They are legal. Similar gauges, regulators, and other pneumatic parts can be found at automation direct as well - and note that every team has a $50 Automation Direct voucher they can use! It’s on your primary and secondary team lead’s FIRST dashboard.

For the inspector’s sake and for your own sake, install them where they are easily visible. You will want to monitor the pressure to make sure your pneumatic system is working correctly.
